comment: Whenever you ask her questions she gets really mad. She is also incredibly vague and is bad at explaining things. There are weekly discussion posts and 3 papers, and the prompts for them are so confusing that I all I could write just made no sense. Attendance is strict.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Honestly, she is a nice person but she is not that great of a professor. She does not email back and she grades super late. She makes the class more difficult than it is. I still do not know my grade in the class and it's almost the end of the semester. If you have her as a professor good luck.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dr.K is a very bubbly teacher that makes the class easy for you. She makes you read books for the class but they are graphic novels and super easy. She has a discussion post due every week which have to be 5 paragraphs long and a short 3 page essay every couple of weeks which is very easy. SHE DOESNT LIKE PHONES IN CLASS. final is group project.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: I took World Literature with this professor. Prof brings a appreciable amount of rigor to grading. Prof really knows and loves her subject. Lots of pop quizzes and lots sarcasm. Typically 4 assigned books for reading that must be bought - most of which are awful.

Dr. K is slow to grade and respond to emails, not very understanding, and very sarcastic. Attendance matters and make sure to keep up with the reading because she makes you work for your grade. Not a very good professor, definitely wouldn't take again.

Dr. K is bubbly and passionate. The assigned reading is excellent and easy to keep up with. 3 exams are essay heavy but otherwise mild in difficulty. Only assigns 2 short essays. Very manageable class and if you otherwise enjoy literature it'll be a breeze. Sit in the front of the class and you'll become fast friends.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Dr. K is bubbly and passionate, especially about poetry. The assigned reading is excellent and easy to keep up with. 3 exams are essay heavy but otherwise mild in difficulty. Only assigns 2 short essays. Very manageable class and if you otherwise enjoy literature it'll be a breeze. Sit in the front of the class and you'll become fast friends.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: She is a very sweet lady, but she definitely will get an attitude if you have different views than her or dont read the assigned books. I had to buy 4 books like $10-18 each (annoying). Not an easy A, but I would say easy B. She gives pop quizzes but tells you when youre getting them. You can only have 3 absences, and lets out early every day
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Honestly the only reason I took her class was because it was the only available ENGL1102 left that semester. Clearly there was a reason. Do yourself a favor and take anyone else but her. Condescending. Exactly her way or no way. Brags about being so "busy" with her 7 classes at KSU and Clemson but never grades your papers until last week of class.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: HORRIBLE. 1 week left in the semester, & I've only received 1 grade out of 3 essays. Learned absolutely nothing from her. Gives ZERO feedback. Will talk down to you. The good reviews must be her logging on and reviewing herself. If 0 was a rating, she would of got that from me. Wanna pass? Then don't take her class! Worst (english) prof ever.

I don't know why she has such bad reviews? I hate English classes but I full heartedly enjoyed her class! The textbook is so cool, its a literal comic book! Yes, you do have discussion posts and reading responses but they are EASY A's. I am about to take her again for World Lit 2110 because she is such a good Prof. TAKE HER!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor K may have been the worst professor I've ever had. She was a very tough grader and very bias. If you don't agree with her views on the content of the class, then she will be unfair to you for the duration of the semester. I wouldn't recommend taking her class, the easiest way to pass is to just steer clear of her. DON'T TAKE IT!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dr. K will help you if you ask, but if it still isn't how she wants it you will fail. She doesn't post grades so that you know if you need to fix things, therefore, causing failure. There are a ton of discussion posts to do, 3 papers, a group project, and a final discussion post. Everything is from a comic book. If you want to pass 1102 don't take.

Dr. K is a really hard. I took the hybrid class of her's where its half online and half in class. You have a discussion post and reader response each week and 3 paper and one group project. Very hard grader. She wants it her way or no way. Don't take her. She piles a 3 page paper at the end while you are working on a hard group project. DO NOT TAKE
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Dr. K is hardcore. She went to Harvard and is a really tough grader. Dont skip class.  Had a one page essay each week, a discussion post each week, three papers throughout the semester, a big final group project, and the final discussion post has to be 3 pages long. Don't take her.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: she curses on class and takes about her husband and trying to lose weight. I am a journalism major and this class was tough for me. she gives good feedback and responds back to emails quickly but its the last week of school and all she can tell me about my grade is that  im passing. not a good professor
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Dr. K is one of the most helpful teachers I have ever had. She is clear on what she wants, but always willing to help you get to that point. She is relatable, fun, friendly, and ALWAYS willing to push you to get to your best point. She always emails back & will stay for extra office hours. Anyone that rated her poorly must not have tried.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: If your essays are not on her level of intelligence, YOU WILL FAIL. The whole class she is going to talk about her weekend and then quickly go through the assignment. She also talks really fast and it made the class bored and sleepy.

Spends whole class time talking about her weekend and husband. Forgot to post 5 things on time resulting in 0's in the gradebook. 3 of the required books we never even touched. Currently waiting for her to post Paper 2 rewrite that was to be posted 2 weeks ago, as we write the final paper. Gives everyone same general grade and likes it only her way

She loves to hear herself talk and gives very little time for classroom discussion. She grades very harshly. Unless you write specifically for her opinion, you will fail. She has one vision on how a paper should be written, and has no interest for personality in your writing. She takes the creativity out of writing and ultimately the fun. DontTake
